name: GGD Dark
css:
/* dark theme for GGD made by stopitnow */
@-moz-document domain('gagadaily.com'){@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){body{background-color:#121212;color:#ccc}.GGD2020_story_preview h2,.ipsType_sectionHead{color:#fff}.GGD2020_icon{filter:invert(1)}a{color:#fff}a:hover{color:#008fcc}select{color:#fff}.GGD2020_home_widget_title{color:#fff}.ipsType_richText{color:#bcc0c2}.ipsReact_reactCount>a>span:last-child,.ipsReact_reactCount>span>span:last-child{background-color:rgba(255,255,255,.15);color:#fff}.ipsReact_reactCount{background-color:#000}.ipsDataItem{border-color:#292929}.ipsBreadcrumb [data-action=defaultStream],.ipsBreadcrumb [data-action=markSiteRead],.ipsBreadcrumb>ul>li{color:#a6a6a6}}@media screen and (prefers-color-scheme:dark) and (max-width:767px){.cPost.ipsComment:not(.ipsComment_selected):not(.ipsModerated) .cAuthorPane{background-color:#1f1f1f}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsBox:not(.ipsBox_transparent):not(.ipsModerated){background-color:#171717}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsBox{border-color:#292929}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsType_blendLinks a,a.ipsType_blendLinks{color:#fff}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsQuote{background-color:#000;border-color:#080808}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsQuote .ipsQuote_citation a,.ipsQuote_citation{color:#595959}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsType_pageTitle{color:#fff}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsPagination:not(.ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_first a,.ipsPagination:not(.ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_last a,.ipsPagination:not(.ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_next a,.ipsPagination:not(.ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_page a,.ipsPagination:not(.ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_prev a{color:#fff;border-color:#494949}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsPagination:not(.ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_first a:hover,.ipsPagination:not(.ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_last a:hover,.ipsPagination:not(.ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_next a:hover,.ipsPagination:not(.ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_page a:hover,.ipsPagination:not(.ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_prev a:hover{border-color:#fff!important;background-color:#fff!important;color:#000!important}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsPagination .ipsPagination_page a{text-shadow:none}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsMenu,.ipsWidget{background:#0f0f0f;color:#fff;border-color:#323232}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){hr.ipsHr{border-color:rgba(255,255,255,.05)}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsApp .ipsField_autocomplete,.ipsApp .ipsField_dummy,.ipsApp input[type=date],.ipsApp input[type=datetime-local],.ipsApp input[type=datetime],.ipsApp input[type=email],.ipsApp input[type=month],.ipsApp input[type=number],.ipsApp input[type=password],.ipsApp input[type=search],.ipsApp input[type=tel],.ipsApp input[type=text],.ipsApp input[type=time],.ipsApp input[type=url],.ipsApp input[type=week],.ipsApp textarea{background-color:#000;border-color:rgba(255,255,255,.2);color:#fff}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsDrawer_menu{background-color:#171717}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsApp .ipsButton_link.ipsFollow,.ipsApp .ipsButton_link.ipsPromot{background-color:#000}.ipsApp .ipsButton_link.ipsFollow:hover,.ipsApp .ipsButton_link.ipsPromot:hover{background-color:#1e1e1e}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsApp .ipsButton_link{border-color:#262626}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsFollow .ipsCommentCount{background-color:transparent;color:#bebebe}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsBreadcrumb>ul:last-child>li:last-child{color:#fff;opacity:1}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ggd_record_headline{color:#fff}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ggd_record{color:#fff!important}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsImage{object-fit:cover}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsAreaBackground_reset{background-color:#000}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsStreamItem.ipsStreamItem_contentBlock{border-color:#2d2d2d}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsStreamItem_snippet .ipsType_richText{color:#dfdfdf}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){html[dir=ltr] .ipsStream_withTimeline .ipsStreamItem.ipsStreamItem_contentBlock:before{border-color:transparent #2d2d2d transparent transparent}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){html[dir=ltr] .ipsStream_withTimeline .ipsStreamItem:after{border-color:transparent #000 transparent transparent}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsApp .ipsButton_light{background-color:#000;color:#e7e7e7;border:1px solid #2d2d2d}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){html[dir=ltr] .ipsStream.ipsStream_withTimeline{border-color:#262626}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsStreamItem_time{background-color:#262626}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsFaded.ipsFaded_more{opacity:.55}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsWidget.ipsWidget_horizontal .ipsWidget_title,.ipsWidget.ipsWidget_vertical .ipsWidget_title{color:#b3b3b3;background:#0a0a0a}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsDataList.ipsDataList_zebra .ipsDataItem:not(.ipsDataItem_selected):not(.ipsModerated):not(.ipsDataItem_new):not(.ipsDataItem_success):not(.ipsDataItem_warning):not(.ipsDataItem_error):not(.ipsDataItem_info):not(.ipsDataItem_status):nth-child(even){background:#191919}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsTabs_activeItem{background:#000;color:#fff}}@media screen and (prefers-color-scheme:dark) and (max-width:767px){.ipsTabs{border-top:2px solid #272727;position:relative}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsTabs_panel{background:#171717}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsAreaBackground_light{background:#000}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsWidget .ipsTabs_small .ipsTabs_item:not(.ipsTabs_activeItem){color:inherit}}@media screen and (prefers-color-scheme:dark) and (max-width:767px){.ipsTabs.ipsTabs_showMenu [role=tablist],.ipsTabs:target [role=tablist]{background:#000;color:#fff}.ipsTabs_item:not(.ipsTabs_activeItem){color:#fff!important}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsMenu_title{background-color:#171717}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsMenu_item>a:not(.ipsMenu_itemInline),.ipsMenu_item>span:not(.ipsMenu_itemInline){color:#bbb}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsMenu_sep{border-top-color:#3a3a3a}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsMenu_item.ipsMenu_hover,.ipsMenu_item[data-selected] a,.ipsMenu_item[data-selected] span,ul:not(.ipsMenu_keyNav) .ipsMenu_item:not(.ipsMenu_itemClicked):not(.ipsMenu_itemDisabled) a:not(.ipsMenu_itemInline):hover{background:#1a1a1a}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsMenu_footerBar,.ipsMenu_headerBar{background:#000;border-color:#242424}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsDataList_readStatus .ipsDataItem:not(.ipsDataItem_unread):not(.ipsDataItem_selected):not(.ipsModerated){background:#151515}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsAreaBackground{background:#2c2c2c}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsType_huge{color:#bbb}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsComposeArea_dummy{background:#191919}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.cke_wysiwyg_div,.cke_wysiwyg_frame{background-color:#0d0d0d}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.cke_top{background:#151515}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.cke_button_icon{filter:invert(1)}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){a.cke_button_disabled:active,a.cke_button_disabled:focus,a.cke_button_disabled:hover,a.cke_button_off:active,a.cke_button_off:focus,a.cke_button_off:hover{background:#232323}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsMenu.ipsMenu_bottomLeft:before{border-color:transparent transparent #323232 transparent}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsMenu.ipsMenu_bottomLeft:after{border-color:transparent transparent #000 transparent}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){a.cke_button_on{background:#555}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsSpoiler,.ipsStyle_spoiler{border-color:#3f3f3f;background:#161616}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsSpoiler_header{background:#1c1c1c;color:#7e7e7e}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsDialog>div{background:#000;border:1px solid #303030}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsDialog_title{color:#fff}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsApp .ipsButton_important{border-color:#fff;color:#fff}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsApp .ipsButton:not(.ipsButton_noHover):hover{cursor:pointer;background-color:#fff;color:#000;background-image:none}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsDialog .ipsDialog_loading{background-color:#000}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsSelectTree{background:#000;border-color:#2b2b2b}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsSelectTree_expand{color:#fff}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsSelectTree_nodes,.ipsSelectTree_nodes [data-role=nodeList]{background:#151515}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsSelectTree_itemDisabled>[data-role=nodeTitle]{color:#3b3b3b}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsSelectTree_nodes [data-role=nodeList] li .ipsSelectTree_item:not(.ipsSelectTree_itemDisabled):hover{background:#1d1d1d}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsApp .ipsButton_primary{border:1px solid #fff}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsComment:not(.ipsModerated) .ipsComment_header{background:#212121;border-top:1px solid #3a3a3a}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsComment{background:#121212}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsAttachment_progress{border:1px solid #282828;background:#171717;overflow:hidden}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsAttachment_progress>span{border-radius:none!important;background-color:#fff}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsButtonBar{background:#0d0d0d}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsApp .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_first a,.ipsApp .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_last a,.ipsApp .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_next a,.ipsApp .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_page a,.ipsApp .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_prev a{background:#000;color:#fff}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_page.ipsPagination_active a{background:#fff;border-color:#fff;color:#000}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_pageJump a{color:#959595}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.cMessage_active{background-color:#000!important}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsButtonBar .ipsButtonRow li>a,.ipsButtonBar .ipsButtonRow li>button,.ipsButtonBar .ipsButtonRow li>span{background:#000;color:#8f8f8f}}@media screen and (prefers-color-scheme:dark) and (max-width:767px){.cMessage_members>ol>li{border-bottom:1px solid #2b2b2b}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){html[dir=ltr] .cMessage_members>ol>li{border-right-color:#272727}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){html[dir=rtl] .cMessage_members>ol>li{border-right-color:#272727}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsMenu.ipsMenu_topCenter:before{border-color:#323232 transparent transparent transparent}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsMenu.ipsMenu_topCenter:after{border-color:#0f0f0f transparent transparent transparent}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsMenu.ipsMenu_topRight:before{border-color:#323232 transparent transparent transparent}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsMenu.ipsMenu_topRight:after{border-color:#0f0f0f transparent transparent transparent}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsMenu.ipsMenu_bottomCenter:before{border-color:transparent transparent #323232 transparent}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsMenu.ipsMenu_bottomCenter:after{border-color:transparent transparent #0f0f0f transparent}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.other,li[data-value=other]{background-color:#6e6e6e}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.question,li[data-value=question]{background-color:#085391}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.funny,li[data-value=funny]{background-color:#e42c1b}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.opinion,li[data-value=opinion]{background-color:#f4014e;background-image:linear-gradient(45deg,#f4014e,#b011b0 33%,#f4014e,#b011b0 100%)}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.thought,li[data-value=thought]{background-color:#107562}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.society,li[data-value=society]{background-color:#5a1d87}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.video,li[data-value="new video"]{background-color:#2bc545;background-image:linear-gradient(45deg,#2bc545,#158e2b 33%,#2bc545,#158e2b 100%)}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){html[dir=ltr] .ipsReact_blurb:not(.ipsHide)+.ipsReact_types{border-left-color:#363636}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){html[dir=rtl] .ipsReact_blurb:not(.ipsHide)+.ipsReact_types{border-right-color:#363636}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsSideMenu_item:not(.ipsSideMenu_itemActive) a:hover,a.ipsSideMenu_item:not(.ipsSideMenu_itemActive):hover,span.ipsSideMenu_item:not(.ipsSideMenu_itemActive):hover{background:#000}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsFieldRow_section,.ipsTable.ipsMatrix .ipsMatrix_subHeader{background:#222;color:#fff}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsApp select:not([multiple]){background-image:linear-gradient(to bottom,#000 0,#000 100%);border-color:rgba(255,255,255,.2)}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.audio,li[data-value=audio]{background-color:#0f705e}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.blog,li[data-value=blog]{background-color:#007380}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.member,li[data-value=member]{background-color:#475c66}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.politics,li[data-value=politics]{background-image:linear-gradient(-45deg,#b81417 0,#b81417 50%,#0974aa 50%,#0974aa 100%);background-image:-webkit-repeating-linear-gradient(-45deg,#b81417 0,#b81417 50%,#0974aa 50%,#0974aa 100%)}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.charts,.sales,li[data-value=charts],li[data-value=sales]{background-color:#006157;background-image:linear-gradient(45deg,#167683,#006157 33%,#167683,#006157 100%)}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.music,li[data-value="new music"]{background-color:#004a99;background-image:linear-gradient(45deg,#006e99,#004a99 33%,#006e99,#004a99 100%)}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.news,li[data-value="music news"],li[data-value=news]{background-color:#782092;background-image:linear-gradient(45deg,#782092,#009 33%,#782092,#009 100%)}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.cPollVoteBar{background:#282828}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsType_light{color:#d5d5d5}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsApp .ipsButton.cMultiQuote{background-color:#242424}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsReact_button{filter:grayscale(100%)}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.cStreamFilter{background:#0d0d0d}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.cStreamFilter h3{color:#fff}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.cStreamFilter a{color:#747474}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.cStreamFilter p em{opacity:.6}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.cStreamForm_list li a.ipsSideMenu_item.ipsSideMenu_itemActive+.cStreamForm_menu,.cStreamForm_list li a.ipsSideMenu_item:not(.ipsSideMenu_itemActive):hover+.cStreamForm_menu{background:#202020}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsPagination .ipsPagination_page.ipsPagination_active a{background-color:#000;border-color:#fff;color:#fff}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsApp .ipsButton:not(.ipsButton_noHover):hover a{color:#000}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsSpoiler .ipsSpoiler_header a,.ipsStyle_spoiler .ipsSpoiler_header a{color:#7e7e7e}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){#elUserNav>li>a#elRegisterButton:hover{color:#000}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsTabs_panels.ipsTabs_contained{border-color:#2d2d2d;background-color:#000}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsHovercard{background:#000;border:1px solid #2d2d2d}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsHovercard_stemBottom .ipsHovercard_stem{border-color:transparent transparent #000 transparent}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsHovercard_stemBottom .ipsHovercard_stem:before{border-color:transparent transparent #2d2d2d transparent}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsHovercard_stemTop .ipsHovercard_stem{border-color:#000 transparent transparent transparent}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsHovercard_stemTop .ipsHovercard_stem:before{border-color:#2d2d2d transparent transparent transparent}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsAreaBackground_light .ipsButtonRow li>a:not(.ipsButtonRow_active),.ipsAreaBackground_light .ipsButtonRow li>button:not(.ipsButtonRow_active),.ipsAreaBackground_light .ipsButtonRow li>span:not(.ipsButtonRow_active){background-color:#131313;color:#cdcdcd}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.cPopularItem_stats{color:#d5d5d5}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsTabs{background-color:#006999}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsTabs.ipsTabs_contained{border-color:#2d2d2d #2d2d2d transparent #2d2d2d}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsType_veryLarge{color:#aeaeae}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsUserPhoto{background:#000}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.cPastLeaders_cell{background:#121212}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.cPastLeaders_title span{background:0 0}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsAutocompleteMenu{background:#000;border:1px solid #2d2d2d}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.ipsAutocompleteMenu_item[data-selected]{background:#121212}}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.traditional,li[data-value="traditional art"]{background-color:#000}}}
